plays.text: Goal scored by Steve Reinprecht assisted by Radim Vrbata and Vaclav Nedorost
Penalty to Jon Klemm 2 minutes for Interference Vaclav Nedorost
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Dean McAmmond
Penalty to Greg de Vries 2 minutes for Crosschecking Sergei Berezin
Goal scored by Alex Tanguay assisted by Radim Vrbata
Penalty to Patrick Roy 2 minutes for Delay of Game(opposing player not identified) served by Alex Tanguay

Goal scored by Milan Hejduk assisted by Peter Forsberg and Derek Morris
Goal scored by Alexei Zhamnov assisted by Steve Sullivan and Kyle Calder
Goal scored by Serge Aubin assisted by Rob Blake and Alex Tanguay
Goal scored by Steve Thomas assisted by Steve McCarthy and Andrei Nikolishin
Penalty to Theo Fleury 2 minutes for Roughing Peter Forsberg
Goal scored by Radim Vrbata assisted by Greg de Vries
Penalty to Peter Forsberg 2 minutes for Crosschecking Alexei Zhamnov
Goal scored by Eric Daze assisted by Alexander Karpovtsev and Alexei Zhamnov
